page.title: 04HEALTH_Food
page.content: My favourite food is chicken and lots of salt,vinegar and daddies tomato ketchup. My favourite breakfast is rice krispies mixed with strawberries. My favourite dinner is a roast dinner with cabbage, colifiower, meat, peas, carrots, potatoes, apple sauce, bread sauce, mint sauce and gravy. We call our roast sunday roast because we eat it on sunday. Many people have different favourite meals.In the fields around here the farmers plant. Wheat, corn, potatoes, turnips, swedes and other crops. In our garden we grow. radishs, potatoes, carrots, onions, rhubarb, runner beans, beet root and spring onions.
